name: scriptextractor
description:
Extract JavaScript from HTML files and writes it to separate files. 
 ScriptExtractor is a powerful Visual Studio Code extension designed to help developers extract JavaScript code from HTML files with ease. Whether you're working on a large project or a single file, ScriptExtractor simplifies the process by identifying and extracting all JavaScript within <script> tags and saving it to a separate .js file.

scriptextractor.excludePaths.description: List of paths to exclude from JavaScript extraction.

scriptextractor.outJsPath.description: Directory path where the extracted JavaScript should be saved.

scriptextractor.outHtmlPath.description: Directory path where the HTML files should be saved.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
